post.summary: Send Message To A Phone Number Or Contact Id
post.description:
To send a text message to a given telephone number or a contact
- **widget_id**: Widget ID to be used for initiating the call. It must be connected to WhatsApp or SMS.
- **to**: phone number of the recipient. should contain the country code. For ex: 16501111234 
- **contact_id**: contact ID to whom the message is to be sent. (either to or contact_id must be given)
- **message**: text message to be sent.
- **start_new_conversation**: whether to start a new conversation or pick the latest.

To send messages to a list of contacts in bulk
- **widget_id**: Widget ID to be used for sending the message. It must be connected to WhatsApp or SMS.
- **contact_ids**: list of contact IDs to whom the message is to be sent.
- **message**: text message to be sent.
- **start_new_conversation**: whether to start a new conversation or pick the latest.

- **email**: email address of the contact.

get.summary: Refreshes the credits for a subaccount
get.description:
To be used by Agency admins only. Refreshes the credits of your subaccounts with an optional field to set the next billing date.
- **agency_id**: the agency ID under which the subaccount is created
- **subaccount_user_id**: the user ID for which the billing refresh has to be performed
- **next_billing_cycle_in_months**: sets the next refresh date for the user. default = as per the billing plan

get.summary: Change the billing plan of a subaccount
get.description:
To be used by Agency admins only. Changes the billing plan of subaccount.
- **agency_id**: the agency ID under which the subaccount is created
- **subaccount_user_id**: the user ID for which the billing refresh has to be performed
- **new_billing_plan_id**: billing_plan_id for the new plan

conversation_id.title: Conversation Id
conversation_id.description: The unique ID of the conversation. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: The unique ID of the contact. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

widget_id.title: Widget Id
widget_id.description: The unique ID of the widget used for the call. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

assistant_id.title: Assistant Id
assistant_id.description: The unique ID of the assistant used for the call. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: The direction of the call. Must be either 'inbound' or 'outbound'.

from_number.title: From Number
from_number.description: Phone number to call from. Ex: 16501234567

to_number.title: To Number
to_number.description: Phone number to call to. Ex: 16501234567

telephony_provider.description: Details of telephony provider used for the call. Ex: Twilio, Plivo, Telnyx, etc.

prompt_dynamic_variables.title: Prompt Dynamic Variables
prompt_dynamic_variables.description: Dynamic variables to used in the prompt. Ex: {'name': 'Bob', 'appointment_day': 'tomorrow', 'reason': 'for confirmation of appointment'}

conversation_id.title: Conversation Id
conversation_id.description: The unique ID of the conversation. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: The unique ID of the contact. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

widget_id.title: Widget Id
widget_id.description: The unique ID of the widget used for the call. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

assistant_id.title: Assistant Id
assistant_id.description: The unique ID of the assistant used for the call. Ex: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: The direction of the call. Must be either 'inbound' or 'outbound'.

from_number.title: From Number
from_number.description: Phone number to call from. Ex: 16501234567

to_number.title: To Number
to_number.description: Phone number to call to. Ex: 16501234567

telephony_provider.description: Details of telephony provider used for the call. Ex: Twilio, Plivo, Telnyx, etc.

prompt_dynamic_variables.title: Prompt Dynamic Variables
prompt_dynamic_variables.description: Dynamic variables to used in the prompt. Ex: {'name': 'Bob', 'appointment_day': 'tomorrow', 'reason': 'for confirmation of appointment'}

contact_ids.title: Recipient contact IDs
contact_ids.description: List of UUIDs that identify the contacts to receive the campaign.

message.title: Message body
message.description: (Only for Chat based assistants, ignored for calling) Message to be sent
message.example: Hi Adam, check out our new offer!

start_new_conversation.title: Force new conversation
start_new_conversation.description: (Always True for calling campaigns) Start a brand‑new thread instead of replying in the existing one.

to.title: To
to.description: The phone number to call. Must be in E.164 format. Ex: 16501234567

prompt_dynamic_variables.title: Prompt Dynamic Variables
prompt_dynamic_variables.description: Dynamic variables to be used in the prompt. Ex: {'name': 'Bob', 'appointment_day': 'tomorrow', 'reason': 'for confirmation of appointment'}
